mapper.select:
SELECT t.uid, t.id, t.document_number, t.approval_status, t.has_read, t.monitor_status, t.alert_node, t.original_dep, t.operator_name, t.owned_purchas_line, t.purchasing_type, t.initiate_dep, t.single_source_clause, t.pricing_model, t.estimated_amount, t.procurement_model, t.sys_for_purchasing_method, t.changed_purchasing_method, t.party_a, t.party_b, t.contract_execution_time, t.statistics_city_name
,op1.operation_name,op1.by_operation_people_id
FROM
t_oa_purchase_singlesource t
(select Max(id) id,uid from t_oa_operation where by_operation_people_id =#{param.ldapId} group by uid) op inner join t_oa_operation op1 on op.id=op1.id inner join t_oa_purchase_singlesource t on op.uid=t.uid
t.id =#{param.id}
and initiate_dep LIKE concat('%',#{param.initiateDep},'%')
and owned_purchas_line LIKE concat('%',#{param.ownedPurchasLine},'%')
and purchasing_type LIKE concat('%',#{param.purchasingType},'%')
and procurement_model LIKE concat('%',#{param.procurementModel},'%')
and statistics_city_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.statisticsCityName},'%')
and party_a LIKE concat('%',#{param.partyA},'%')
and party_b LIKE concat('%',#{param.partyB},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date,'%Y')=#{param.applyDate}
and alert_node=#{param.alertNode}
and has_read =#{param.hasRead}
and monitor_status =#{param.monitorStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and approval_status = #{param.approvalStatus}
order by update_time desc

select statistics_city_name statistics_city_name_year, estimated_amount estimated_amount_year from t_oa_purchase_singlesource where statistics_city_name is not null
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select statistics_city_name statistics_city_name_day, estimated_amount estimated_amount_day from t_oa_purchase_singlesource where TO_DAYS(apply_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and statistics_city_name is not null
